original_text: If I love people, I will always accept their problems. I will always believe them. I will always hope for what is best. I will always be patient in troubles.
korean_text: 모든 것을 참으며 모든 것을 믿으며 모든 것을 바라며 모든 것을 견디느니라

sentences.original_text: I will always accept their problems
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 항상 그들의 문제들을 받아들일 것입니다

sentences.original_text: I will always hope for what is best
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 항상 최선의 것을 바랄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: I will always be patient in troubles
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 항상 어려움 속에서 인내할 것입니다
